entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
